definition: to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences

sentences.english: So singing a song with emotion needs re-creation for the vocal works.
sentences.chinese: 所以，以情動聲要對聲樂作品進行“二度創作”。

sentences.english: We're now going to make a secondary stroke to create another level of motion.
sentences.chinese: 我們現在要作二度發光，創造另一個運動的水平。

sentences.english: Within seconds of the start of the second half, Obertan almost grabbed a second.
sentences.chinese: 下半場剛開始，奧貝坦幾乎就梅開二度。

sentences.english: Dissonant intervals are the second and the seventh.
sentences.chinese: 不協和音程爲二度和七度。

sentences.english: Water freezes at 3 2 degrees Fahrenheit or 0 degrees Centigrade.
sentences.chinese: 水在華氏三十二度即攝氏零度時結冰。

sentences.english: It was, in a sense, a second courtship.
sentences.chinese: 從某種意義上說，這是一次二度求愛期。

sentences.english: The mercury dived to twelve below zero.
sentences.chinese: 溫度計的水銀柱驟然下降到零下十二度。

sentences.english: Tiago scored twice at the Green Point Stadium in Cape Town.
sentences.chinese: 在開普敦綠點球場內，蒂亞戈梅開二度。

sentences.english: George Clooney has been named the "*iest man alive" for the second time by People magazine.
sentences.chinese: 喬治克魯尼二度被《人物》評選爲“非常性感男人”。

sentences.english: Based upon the theory of upward continuation of two-dimensional magnetic anomaly data, a corresponding downward continuation formula has been derived.
sentences.chinese: 從二度磁異常上延理論出發，推導出一種下延方法。

sentences.english: Two degree vehicle net Hangzhou person in charge is smug .
sentences.chinese: 二度車網杭州負責人躊躇滿志。

sentences.english: His wife believed this to mean he would be elected to a second term but would not survive (Sandburg, 195).
sentences.chinese: 他的妻子相信這意味着他將二度當選，但將不會生還。

sentences.english: Striker Luis Fabiano had two goals for Brazil and was named Man of the Match .
sentences.chinese: 巴西前鋒法比亞諾本場梅開二度，被評爲本場最佳。

sentences.english: This year I've scored two braces that were completely different from one another.
sentences.chinese: 今年，我已經兩次梅開二度了，每一次都不同。

sentences.english: Water freezes at thirty-two degrees Fahrenheit.
sentences.chinese: 水在華氏三十二度時結冰。

sentences.english: The authors report 27 cases of atrial fibrillation merged with second degree of AVB.
sentences.chinese: 本文報道27例心房纖顫合併二度房室傳導阻滯。

definition: five degrees/fifth (basic musical interval, doh to soh)
for the first time/first (meeting, attempt etc)
to continue/to follow after/to go on with/to succeed/to inherit/then/afterwards
separated in time (usu. followed by a quantity of time)
to arise again/to make a comeback/resurgence
